name: 艾琳·威尔逊
introduction: Eryn Wilson was born in Taumarunui, in the North Island New Zealand. In 1981 he moved with his parents and sister to the small Bay of Plenty town of Papamoa. In 1993 Eryn was accepted into Toi Whakaari, The New Zealand Drama School.Upon graduating, Eryn travelled extensively throughout the country working at all of New Zealand's professional theatres as a stage actor. He eventually settled in New Zealand's largest city, Auckland where he put down roots and focused more on his screen work. The rest is history.U.S. screen credits include guest roles in Young Hercules (1999), Cleopatra 2525 (2000), alongside Radha Mitchell and Josh Lucas in When Strangers Appear (2001) , Legend Of The Seeker (2008), Power Rangers (2011).New Zealand film credits include guest roles in The Feathers of Peace (2000), Love Birds (2011), and Orphans & Kingdoms (2014).Television roles include Outrageous Fortune (2005), The Cult (2009), The Kick (2014), The Brokenwood Mysteries (2015), and Bombshell (2016).Eryn still resides in Auckland.
